PPLoc: Priority Post Company, Inc., 95 Aberdeen Rd., Emigsville, PA 17331
activities: Intertnational mailing services for the wholesale industry. With Priority Post Company, Inc.'s access to multi postal delivery systems around the globe, as well as our PQW status with USPS, the Company provides solutions for the cross bordser deliveries of client mail, marketing campaigns, periodicals, catalogues, books and goods.
recoursemech: Any questions regarding the use or disclosure of personal information will be investigated by the appropriate Company Officer to try to reach resolution with respect to disputes in accordance with the Safe Harbor Privacy Policy. Also, the Company agrees to participate in the dispute resolution procedure administrated by the European Data Protection Authorities to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
